title: Alcaparra
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Buffet, Salad bar
description: Try the Shiitake strogonoff on Sundays. Buffet / all you can eat for 24,90RS. Many of the options on the buffet are vegan (ask staff). Plenty of Salads, main dishes and dessert (fruit) + fresh juices (drinks not included in the all you can eat). 10% Discount if paid with cash. Segunda a sexta das 11:30-15:30 horas, sabado e domingo das 11-16 horas.
